index.js

Module dependencies.

 
var fmt = require('util').format;
var amp = require('amp');

Proxy methods.

 
var methods = [
  'push',
  'pop',
  'shift',
  'unshift'
];

Expose Message.

 
module.exports = Message;

Initialize an AMP message with the given args or message buffer.

Params
args Array Buffer or blob
API
public 
function Message(args) {
  if (Buffer.isBuffer(args)) args = decode(args);
  this.args = args || [];
}

proxy methods

 
methods.forEach(function(method){
  Message.prototype[method] = function(){
    return this.args[method].apply(this.args, arguments);
  };
});

Inspect the message.

Returns
String
API
public 
Message.prototype.inspect = function(){
  return fmt('<Message args=%d size=%d>',
    this.args.length,
    this.toBuffer().length);
};

Return an encoded AMP message.

Returns
Buffer
API
public 
Message.prototype.toBuffer = function(){
  return encode(this.args);
};

Decode msg and unpack all args.

Params
msg Buffer
Returns
Array
API
private 
function decode(msg) {
  var args = amp.decode(msg);
  
  for (var i = 0; i < args.length; i++) {
    args[i] = unpack(args[i]);
  }

  return args;
}

Encode and pack all args.

Params
args Array
Returns
Buffer
API
private 
function encode(args) {
  var tmp = new Array(args.length);

  for (var i = 0; i < args.length; i++) {
    tmp[i] = pack(args[i]);
  }

  return amp.encode(tmp);
}

Pack arg.

Params
arg Mixed
Returns
Buffer
API
private 
function pack(arg) {

blob

 
  if (Buffer.isBuffer(arg)) return arg;

string

 
  if ('string' == typeof arg) return new Buffer('s:' + arg);

undefined

 
  if (arg === undefined) arg = null;

json

 
  return new Buffer('j:' + JSON.stringify(arg));
}

Unpack arg.

Params
arg Buffer
Returns
Mixed
API
private 
function unpack(arg) {

json

 
  if (isJSON(arg)) return JSON.parse(arg.slice(2));

string

 
  if (isString(arg)) return arg.slice(2).toString();

blob

 
  return arg;
}

String argument.

 
function isString(arg) {
  return 115 == arg[0] && 58 == arg[1];
}

JSON argument.

 
function isJSON(arg) {
  return 106 == arg[0] && 58 == arg[1];
}

ID argument.

 
function isId(arg) {
  return 105 == arg[0] && 58 == arg[1];
}
